com.machinevision.terminal

类 NetThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.machinevision.terminal.NetThread
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CommunicationInterface, java.lang.Runnable

    public class NetThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements CommunicationInterface
    网络通信线程
